Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: Delays Affecting Red Line Trains
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/significant delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Sheridan.  Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Sheridan. We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

  • Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service between Belmont and Howard in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#22 Clark
#36 Broadway
#151 Sheridan
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Please see personnel or visit transitchicago.com for details.
